description:
Nezumi comes to confiscate Nami`s treasure, but who`s he working for? More importantly, who`s Nami working for, and what`s she gonna do with her booty?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Rises! Result of the Broken Promise!
Luffy Tatsu! Uragirareta Yakusoku no Ketsumatsu!
Luffy arrive ! La fin de la trahison !
ไปกันเถอะ! การสัญญาของลูฟี่!
ルフィ立つ! 裏切られた約束の結末!
